description:
The "mage" of the group, as he is after the bearer of the eye of Aeon. It uses scrolls as his weapon. He is quickly killed by Kukuri, however one part of it`s head "scholastica" manage to fled causing it to survive. However it is killed by Shiori afterwards. In the game, his two parted head is cut down by Misuzu using Doujikiri and Scholastica dies at this time instead and Acedia is killed by Shiori afterwards. Scholastica is actually Acedia`s sister and they share a body. His Index`s name is "Benedict of the Bookshelf". It is revealed by Shiori that Benedict and George are people in her family line. Shiori refers to him as her prototype when she kills him.
It is named after one of the 7 Cardinal Sins, discouragement (acedia in latin), today referred to as sloth.
Its real identity is the historical figure of Saint Benedict of Nursia.
name: Acedia
